means: 复制( copy的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Most have slavishly copied the design of IBM'sbig mainframe machines.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数公司都一味模仿IBM公司大型主机的设计。

sentence.Network_en: Instructors read slowly and students copied down what was said.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师慢慢地念，学生们把所念的记下来。

sentence.Network_en: Tape is expensive and loses sound quality every time it is copied.
sentence.Network_cn: 磁带成本高，而且每录制一次音质就会变差一些。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2011职称英语... ... densely——compactly 浓密地, 浓厚地 duplicated——copied 复制出的,复写书的 depicts——describes 描述, 描写.

there were personal computers before 1984 , but it took the Macintosh , which Apple launched that year , to popularise the icon-based graphical interface that others copied , kicking off the PC era .早于1984年之前就有个人电脑，但是当年苹果Macintosh的推出，使被其它公司拷贝的基于图标的图形界面备受欢
复制复制的(copied), 此释义来源于网络辞典。-
bottle - bank scheme took off and was copied everywhere ., 瓶子银行计划很成功 , 到处都在效仿它.

list.abs: 外企英语_百度百科 ... 11. NG:No good 不合格 12. CC:Carbon copy 抄送（carbon copy） 14. Conference Call 电话会议.
深拷贝（deep copy）:对对象实例中字段引用的对象也进行拷贝。#encoding=utf-8 # #by panda #原型模式  import copy  def printInfo(in.
版税copyright royalty royalties royalties on books copy money 版税、上演税或.
浅拷贝(shallow copy)对于引用类型对象中的值类型字段进行了逐位复制。赋值运算符只是把源对象的引用赋值给目的对象，两者引用 …

entry.def: If you make a copy of something, you produce something that looks like the original thing.

example.ex: The reporter apparently obtained a copy of Steve's resignation letter...
example.tran: 那记者显然弄到了史蒂夫辞职信的复印件。

example.ex: Always keep a copy of everything in your own files.
example.tran: 要时刻牢记把所有文件都备份。

entry.def: If you copy something, you produce something that looks like the original thing.

example.ex: She never participated in obtaining or copying any classified documents for anyone.
example.tran: 她从未参与过为任何人获取或复制机密文件之事。

example.ex: ...lawsuits against companies who have unlawfully copied computer programs.
example.tran: 对非法复制计算机程序的公司提起的诉讼

entry.def: If you copy a piece of writing, you write it again exactly.

example.ex: He would allow John slyly to copy his answers to impossibly difficult algebra questions...
example.tran: 他会让约翰偷偷抄下自己对一些极难的代数题的解答。

example.ex: He copied the data into a notebook...
example.tran: 他将数据抄在一个笔记本上。

entry.def: If you copy a person or what they do, you try to do what they do or try to be like them, usually because you admire them or what they have done.

example.ex: Children can be seen to copy the behaviour of others whom they admire or identify with...
example.tran: 人们发现儿童会模仿他们所崇拜或有共鸣感的人。

example.ex: He can claim to have been defeated by opponents copying his own tactics.
example.tran: 他可以说是被仿效自己策略的对手们给打败了。

entry.def: A copy of a book, newspaper, or CD is one of many that are exactly the same.

example.ex: I bought a copy of 'USA Today' from a street-corner machine...
example.tran: 我从街角的自动售卖机买了一份《今日美国》。

example.ex: You can obtain a copy for $2 from New York Central Art Supply.
example.tran: 花两美元就能从纽约艺术用品中心买到一册。

entry.tran: (准备刊印或广播的)原稿，稿件
entry.def: In journalism, copy is written material that is ready to be printed or read in a broadcast.

example.ex: ...his ability to write the most lyrical copy in the history of sports television.
example.tran: 他能够撰写体育节目史上最富热情和激情的稿件

entry.tran: 有报道价值的消息;新闻素材
entry.def: In journalism, copy is news or information that can be used in an article in a newspaper.

means.word_mean: 1. derived by copying something else; especially by following lines seen through a transparent sheet

auth_sentence.content: But he copied it down as a lottery number.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he copied it down as a lottery number.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he copied it down as a lottery number.

auth_sentence.content: I have never copied, mixing things and ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have never copied, mixing things and ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have never copied, mixing things and ideas.

auth_sentence.content: I copied & pasted from my response at Yahoo!
auth_sentence.res_content: I copied & pasted from my response at Yahoo!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I copied & pasted from my response at Yahoo!

Sentence.sentence: The very process imposed a limitation on the quantity of materials copied.
Google has reversed this – it has simply copied all these works without bothering to ask
The key principle of copyright law has always been that works can be copied only once authors have expressly given their permission," says Piers Blofeld, of the Sheil Land literary agency in London.
